name: Mionions 2: Unfinished Christmas Edition
description:
Originally created in 10 days for the "Unnecessary Sequels" Awful Summer Jam. Updated to include some quality of life changes and a vague Christmas theme. Still plenty of bugs and missing features to eventually be added but hopefully this will bring some amount of enjoyment for the time being.

Features:

  • shoot little guys with coal and send them flying with your foot
  • funny voices (humor not guaranteed)
  • slowmo
  • physics
  • it's free

If you played it, let me know what you thought on Twitter (@SchaefferAustin)

Please keep in mind this is more of a prototype than a finished game, so don't expect much lol.
